content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System (around x=-5.0, y=2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) facing RIGHT
- Boiler at position (x=-5.0, y=2.5) facing RIGHT (fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at position (x=0.5, y=6.5) facing RIGHT
- Small electric pole at position (x=0.5, y=8.5)
- Pipe network connecting these components

### Iron Mining and Smelting (around x=18.5, y=74.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (x=18.5, y=74.5) facing DOWN
- Stone furnace at position (x=19.0, y=77.0) - currently out of fuel
- Inserter at position (x=19.5, y=78.5) facing DOWN
- Small electric pole at position (x=20.5, y=77.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=17.5, y=72.5)
- Iron chest at position (x=19.5, y=79.5) for iron plate storage containing 169 iron plates
- Additional wooden chest at position (x=19.5, y=80.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting (around x=-48.5, y=79.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (x=-48.5, y=79.5) facing DOWN
- Stone furnace at position (x=-48.0, y=82.0) - currently out of fuel
- Inserter at position (x=-47.5, y=83.5) facing DOWN
- Small electric pole at position (x=-46.5, y=77.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=-46.5, y=82.5)
- Copper chest at position (x=-47.5, y=84.5) for copper plate storage containing 194 copper plates
- Additional wooden chest at position (x=-47.5, y=85.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production (around x=10.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine for copper cables at position (x=7.5, y=18.5)
- Wooden chest at position (x=3.5, y=18.5) for copper plate input containing 14 copper plates
- Assembling machine for electronic circuits at position (x=13.5, y=18.5)
- Inserter at position (x=10.5, y=18.5) facing RIGHT to move copper cables to circuit assembler
- Output inserter at position (x=15.5, y=18.5) facing RIGHT
- Output wooden chest at position (x=16.5, y=18.5) containing 6 electronic circuits
- Small electric pole at position (x=15.5, y=20.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=13.5, y=20.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=8.5, y=20.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=5.5, y=19.5)

### Electricity Network
An extensive electricity network connecting all powered structures with multiple small electric poles distributed across the map. The network has been fully connected to all production entities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Always check if a tile is already occupied before placing an entity
- When placing electric poles near machines, place them adjacent to but not directly on top of other entities
- Use `place_entity_next_to` with appropriate spacing parameters to avoid collisions
- When using `place_entity_next_to`, be aware of existing entities that might be in the target position
- For assembling machine setups, carefully plan the positions of inserters to ensure they don't conflict with other entities

### Errors with inserter placement
- Ensure inserter pickup and drop positions are not blocked by other entities
- When placing inserters near assembling machines, check that they don't overlap with the machine's working area
- Consider the direction and orientation of inserters relative to the machines they service

### Errors connecting entities with pipes
- When connecting entities with pipes using `connect_entities`, ensure there is a
